physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patients exhibited symptoms such as anemia, thrombocytopenia, and acute renal failure (in various cases). One patient exhibited hypertension and renal insufficiency (creatinine clearance: 38 ml/min/1.73 m2) while receiving medication.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The clinical progression of disease varied; some patients improved with treatment (e.g., plasma exchange and hemodialysis), while others like patient 10 experienced a recurrence of symptoms post-transplantation.
